overview: Current Layers represents the topology of the current times or the layers to represent how we look. The work consists of three layers: ‘The Chronological Study on Earth’ looking into the history of layers in alignment with the folklore mythology of Hawaii; ‘The Form of a Plastiglomeratic Life’ depicting the future to come following the current plastic abuse; and ‘The Manner of a Photoshopping Life’ dealing with our mode of expression varying with the usage of computers.
title: Current Layers
